/* EnveduCntrDao.selectEnveduCntrList */ SELECT A.ORDRID , B.CD_NM AS SE_CD , C.CTPRVN_NM AS RGN_CD , A.CNTR_NM , A.INST_NM , A.HMPG , A.REG_DT , (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM TB_CMM_ENVEDU_CNTR WHERE RGN_CD = A.RGN_CD AND SE_CD = #{seCd} GROUP BY RGN_CD) CNTR_CNT FROM TB_CMM_ENVEDU_CNTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD B ON A.SE_CD = B.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_ADDR_CTPRVN C ON A.RGN_CD = C.CTPRVN_CD WHERE 1=1
AND SE_CD = #{seCd}

/* EnveduCntrDao.selectPrvtEnvEduCntrList */ SELECT A.INST_NM , CASE WHEN (LENGTH(A.HMPG) < 1 OR A.HMPG IS NULL) THEN NULL WHEN INSTR(A.HMPG, '://') > 0 THEN A.HMPG ELSE CONCAT('https://', A.HMPG) END AS HMPG , A.TELNO , A.ADDR , A.ADDR_DTL , A.LOGO_FILEID , B.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY , A.REG_DT , A.RGTRID , A.MDFCN_DT , A.MDFRID FROM TB_CMM_INST A LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_FILE B ON B.FILEID = A.LOGO_FILEID LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD C ON A.INST_TYPE_CD = C.CD WHERE 1=1 AND C.UPPR_CD = 108102 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.APRV_STTS_CD = 2 ORDER BY A.INST_NM
